title: What is your role pref order?
body:
For me it probably is 

ADC=SUP (I would pretty much play either without much preferance for one over the other)>TOP>MID>JUNGLE
If you see me in the Jungler role, we likely have lost already lol.

replies.body: I love how these posts find the few support mains.
right? where the hell are they at when i queue?

> [{quoted}](name=xXxLeviathanxXx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pdfPEfrl,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-02-04T19:04:58.891+0000)
>
> right? where the hell are they at when i queue?

we are all probably in game by then since our support queue time is like instant.
you deserve it.

lol oh an regarding auto fill...

i chose fill nearly 90% of the time
Mid-Top-Support-Jungle-ADC

Mid by far > Top=Jungle slightly > Support (if I don't get that bitchy adc)

Adc (I hate this role and autofill always puts me there)

ADC or Sup / Mid / Top / Jungle

Please come take my position from me if I'm top or jungle, cause I probably don't know what I'm doing here.

Mid
Support
Adc
---dislike but can play---
Top
Jungle

(Mid and support are kind of equal, but yea, maybe mid>supp by 0.1%)

I kind of suck top, and can only play 1 champ for both top and jungle (trying to learn more), but I feel like jungle requires more skill and timing... so top is easier ahah.
Jung>top/mid/support>??>??>??>??>??>??>??>adc

support 
top
adc
jungle
mid
bless you. not many ppl playing support. so much riot is trying to make you play it

starting end of season2/preseason 3 

played support this entire time

i can legit play these champs at as support 

{{champion:12}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:115}} 

also messed around with 
{{champion:22}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:98}} (well old shen )

Try {{champion:164}} support.

My build usually is {{item:2303}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3742}} and either {{item:3074}} or {{item:3748}} depending on if I the team is ahead or if the team needs more of a tankier support or if I prefer one over the other that game lol.

Max REQW going EWQ as first 3 skills. Early (pre-6) is a bit more defensive being melee, but take any advantage given to use your E for a trade/engage.

i never played her and dont own her atm

i also dont have kled are ivern
she is fun as support
Mid>Top>Jg>Sup>Bot

Jungle > Top = Mid > Support > ADC

I'm a fill main, and I can play every role very well, and have dozens of champs per role (minus ADC)... but I've been forced to play bot lane so much I'm just sick of it. And most ADCs aren't fun for me -- only ones I really enjoy are Jhin, Ez and Trist, sometimes Lucian, though I can play all of them.

Jungle is definitely my favorite role though.

jg, support, top, mid, adc/carry

dont give me adc.
 
plz
OMG all these support players. Where the hell are you guys when I get in a lobby. Seems every lobby I get someone wants to sell their soul to avoid playing support.
anything but bot lane
Sup/Mid and god forbid i'm put anywhere else.
for me its Support, Jungle, Mid, ADC then the dreaded top lane... idk why, but i just cant not play top to save my life.
Jungle > Support == Top > MId > ADC
